column4: Gaaah! That stupid new left-side bar in 11.04 gets stuck all the time. Either above all my windows unable to hide, or the app starter is stuck behind my windows, unable to get to the front. Wtf is happening?
just select ubutnu classic interface from login page.
thanks, that just saved my life :P
np I realy like cairo-dock, although a little off-topic.
